Halle Bailey Tapped to Play Ariel in ‘The Little Mermaid’
Halle Bailey, half of the sister duo Chloe x Halle, will next be going under the
sea, starring as Ariel in the upcoming adaptation of “The Little Mermaid.”
This article was republished here with permission from The Associated
Press, however it is no longer available to read on Snopes.com.
NEW YORK (AP) — Halle Bailey, half of the sister duo Chloe x Halle, will
next be going under the sea, starring as Ariel in the upcoming adaptation
of “The Little Mermaid.” The live-action version will include original
songs from the 1989 animated hit as well as new tunes from original
composer Alan Menken and “Hamilton” creator Lin-Manuel Miranda. Some of
